quantum_anchor.PAULI_COMMUTATORS: Lean: CoherenceLattice/Quantum/Pauli.lean lemmas: comm_sigmaX_sigmaY, comm_sigmaY_sigmaZ, comm_sigmaZ_sigmaX
quantum_anchor.SIGMAZ_EIGENSTATES: Lean: Pauli.lean lemmas: σz_mul_ket0, σz_mul_ket1; normalization: norm_ket0, norm_ket1; orthogonality: orth_ket0_ket1
quantum_anchor.SIGMAX_EIGENSTATES: Lean: Pauli.lean lemmas: σx_mul_ketPlus, σx_mul_ketMinus; normalization: norm_ketPlus, norm_ketMinus; orthogonality: orth_ketPlus_ketMinus
quantum_anchor.COHERENCE_PROXY_OFFDIAG: Lean: CoherenceLattice/Quantum/Density.lean def: cohOffDiag; lemma: cohOffDiag_of_diag; example: cohOffDiag_outer_ketPlus_pos
quantum_anchor.TWO_LEVEL_PARTITION_FUNCTION: Lean: CoherenceLattice/Quantum/Thermal.lean lemma: Z_closed; defs: H, expNegβH, Z
quantum_anchor.THERMO_EXPECTED_ENERGY: Lean: CoherenceLattice/Quantum/ThermoExtras.lean lemma: neg_deriv_log_Z_real (or equivalent expected-energy identity)

notes.scope: Orthodox finite-dimensional (qubit) anchor; no new physics claims.
notes.review_target: eigenstates/commutators/normalization/partition function + thermo identity + basis-relative coherence proxy
